IngredientType: CREATE TABLE IngredientType (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, ingredientType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
IngredientOrigin: CREATE TABLE IngredientOrigin (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, ingredientOrigin VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
Ingredients: CREATE TABLE Ingredients (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, name VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, rarity INT, ingredientType INT, A INT, B INT, C INT, D INT, E INT, total INT, taste BOOLEAN, sensation BOOLEAN, aroma BOOLEAN, visual BOOLEAN, sound BOOLEAN, base_price INT, ingredientOrigin INT);
PotionQuality: CREATE TABLE PotionQuality (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, tier VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, zeroStar INT, oneStar INT, twoStar INT, threeStar INT, fourStar INT, fiveStar INT);
PotionType: CREATE TABLE PotionType (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, potionType VARCHAR(255) NOT NULL UNIQUE);
Potions: CREATE TABLE Potions (id INT PRIMARY KEY AUTO_INCREMENT, potionName VARCHAR(255) UNIQUE, potionType INT, A INT, B INT, C INT, D INT, E INT);
